data.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
data.author: Harper Lee
data.description: A gripping portrayal of racial injustice and moral growth in a small Southern town.

data.author: George Orwell
data.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian regime, exploring themes of surveillance and control.

data.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
data.author: Douglas Adams
data.description: A hilarious and inventive science fiction series about the misadventures of Arthur Dent, an unwitting Earthling.
